channel.title: Pk Shop 2 Lost?
channel.description: Ok well this is Alrena the pk shop 2 but i can't find her in autospawn or shops .cfg or anything, i want her to be at varrock but idk where she is! ive looked everywhere! and searched! [code]shop = 4 Pk_Shop_2 2 2 380 15000 386 15000 542 500 544 500 1333 500 1725 500 3105 500 7458 500 7459 500 7460 500 4369 500 4405 500 3751 500 3755 500 3753 500 3385 500 3387 500 3389 500 3391 500 3393 500 5574 500 5575 500 5576 500 6107 500 6108 500 6109 500 1540 100 [/code]

item.title: Pk Shop 2 Lost?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

go in your client.java search for ( wanneshop = and type this in )

           WanneShop = 4; // pk shop 2
        } else if (NPCID == NPCID) { //npc id of your shop
            PutNPCCoords = true;

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Shop 2 Lost?
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Set a new alrena on that place???
Autospawn.cfg

spawn = NPCID	XCORD	YCORD	0	0	0	0	0	1	alrena

Alrena can trade with this:
Client.java until you see like this:

WanneShop = 67; // Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 682) { // PutNPCCoords = true;
Put under it:

WanneShop = SHOPID; // SHOP INFO } else if (NPCID == NPCID) { // NPC INFO PutNPCCoords = true;

Read full topic
